ABCD * D = DCBA (Puzzle+Solution)

Apr 07, 2017 • math

The Puzzle

“ABCD * D = DCBA”, Replace every character with a number to make the equation mathematically right.

The Solution using brute-force algorithm

The final answer is 1089.
